OSRIS.itemShop.title: Osr Item Shop
OSRIS.itemShop.name: Name
OSRIS.itemShop.shopActiveHint: Activate this actor a as new item shop.
OSRIS.shopSelect.title: Item Shop Select
OSRIS.packs.title: Ye Fast Pack
OSRIS.settings.builderCheck: Add open shop checkbox to OSE character builder (if installed)
OSRIS.settings.builderCheckHint: Adds option to open item shop following character creation using the OSE character builder included  with the Old-School-Essentials module.
OSRIS.settings.activateUniversalShopHint: Adds Universal Item Shop to item shop select lists.
OSRIS.settings.addConfigTab: Add Item Shop config tab to character sheets.
OSRIS.settings.addConfigTabHint: Adds an OSRIS tab to the character sheet containing item shop configuration options.
OSRIS.settings.hideConfigHint: Hides the Item Shop configuration tab on character sheets for non GM users.
OSRIS.settings.universalCompHint: Select the desired compendium to use as the Universal Shop Compendium.
OSRIS.settings.hideForeignPackHint: Hides display of unused language translation compendium packs
OSRIS.settings.makePackFolderHint: When selected a folder will be created and included compendiums will be moved to this folder.
OSRIS.settings.packFolderNameHint: Name to use for the compendium folder.
OSRIS.settings.hidePacksTabHint: Hide fast pack tab in the universal item shop.
OSRIS.newShop.title: New Item Shop
OSRIS.newShop.remainderWarn: Remainder cannot be higher than or equal to gold amount.
OSRIS.newShop.noPermission: You do not have permission to use this feature.
OSRIS.newShop.remHint: how much gold to keep when randomly stocking
OSRIS.newShop.appendHint: append a random number to the shop name
OSRIS.newShop.stockHint: stock the shop with a random selection of items
